pathAssistantSteps.info:
Contact Family to Welcome them to Camp Quality and send welcome pack

ACTION: Change to Successful

This is a brand new Family Registration

Refer to Family Sign Up Policy

  • Patient (adult or child) needs a Cancer Diagnosis
  • Must be a child in the family under the age of 13
  • If the Patient (adult or child) has passed away from cancer in the last 2 years


ACTION 1: If the family is eligible for CQ programs, change to Contacted and start welcome process

ACTION 2: If the family is not eligible mark as Unsuccessful and refer if applicable
Now the family is Successful you can Convert Application to create a Household Record
